title: Matthew Lau: Big Tech companies are the unsung heroes of this pandemic - Financial Post
description: Big Tech’s contributions to fighting the pandemic are diverse and significant — from home delivery to the ability to work remotely and more
content:
By Matthew Lau
In the current crisis, health-care professionals, grocery store employees, truck drivers and many others have been widely praised, and rightly so, for continuing to provide essential services. But the pandemic also has unsung heroes, who have … [+4315 chars]
